description: RARE and highly sought after 'Horizons', an executive and uniquely designed townhome complex with great floor plans and features! Premium finishings include: vaulted ceilings, open floor plan, stylish stone gas fireplace, granite counters, stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar, beautifully crafted tile floors, stunning hardwood flooring, PLUS powder room on the main. Three good-sized bedrooms up. Master bath has luxurious five piece ensuite. This pet friendly complex family; private backyard, plus walking distance to transit, schools, recreation & everything else its fantastic family area has to offer!  This is the BEST unit in this complex at the end and a bordering green space!
